hedline.hl1: Actors and Agencies To Resume Mediation

abstract.p: Sceen Actors Guild and American Federation of Television and Radio Artists, unions involved in 15-week-old strike over compensation for work on commercials, say they will attend mediation session in New York on Sept 13; negotiators for advertisers and agencies say they will attend as well (S)

block.p: Two unions involved in the 15-week-old strike over compensation for work on commercials -- the Screen Actors Guild and the American Federation of Television and Radio Artists -- said they would attend a mediation session in New York on Sept. 13. Negotiators for advertisers and agencies said they would attend as well.

Two unions involved in the 15-week-old strike over compensation for work on commercials -- the Screen Actors Guild and the American Federation of Television and Radio Artists -- said they would attend a mediation session in New York on Sept. 13. Negotiators for advertisers and agencies said they would attend as well.
Federal mediators held similar exploratory meetings between the unions and the ad industry on June 13 and July 20, in which no progress was made toward settling the strike, which began on May 1.
